trans-unit.source: Defines an MSBuild task for erasing the contents of temporary files that are used when compiling workflows created using Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个 MSBuild 任务以清除编译的工作流创建的使用 Visual Basic 时使用的临时文件的内容。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the temporary files are erased but the files are not deleted.
trans-unit.target: 临时文件的内容将被清除，但不是会删除文件。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] This class extends the `Task` class of Microsoft Build framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]此类扩展`Task`Microsoft Build 框架的类。

trans-unit.source: The class should be used when compiling Windows Workflow Foundation types of Visual Basic projects.
trans-unit.target: 在编译 Visual Basic 项目的 Windows Workflow Foundation 类型时，应使用类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.CompileWorkflowCleanupTask"></xref> class.
Erases the contents of the files specified in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.CompileWorkflowCleanupTask.TemporaryFiles*> property, without deleting the files.
trans-unit.target: 清除中指定的文件的内容<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.CompileWorkflowCleanupTask.TemporaryFiles*>属性，而不删除文件。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.CompileWorkflowCleanupTask.TemporaryFiles*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the task successfully executed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功执行任务;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of paths to temporary files created when compiling workflows created using Visual Basic .NET.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在编译使用 Visual Basic.NET 创建的工作流时创建的临时文件的路径的数组。

trans-unit.source: A list of temporary files associated with this compilation task.
trans-unit.target: 与此编译任务关联的临时文件的列表。
